# Design System Package

The design system package provides tokens, themes, and consistent UI patterns across all applications in the monorepo.

## Structure

- `tokens/` - Color, spacing, and typography tokens
- `themes/` - Theme definitions (light, dark, and custom themes)
- `motion/` - Animation and transition tokens
- `elevation/` - Shadow and depth tokens
- `typography/` - Typography presets and utilities

## Usage

```ts
import { colors, spacing, typography } from '@repo/design-system';
import { darkTheme, lightTheme } from '@repo/design-system/themes';
```

## Themes

The design system includes several themes:
- Base theme with standard values
- Light theme for light mode UI
- Dark theme for dark mode UI
- JaZeR theme matching the original design aesthetic
